Title: CPS 101 Executive Summary
Body: We will work both with faculty in CPS and in the "served" departments to create CCC: Computing Concepts and Competencies (CPS101),  a 3(2-2), multi-section, service course in which the lecture component gives all students a broad, conceptual overview of  both the concepts of computing and of the competencies needed to solve computer-related problems integral to their major fields of study.
